## Conditions.ConditionSet.toToken() method

Gets a [condition set token](./ts-res.conditionsettoken.md) for this condition set, if possible.

**Signature:**

```typescript
toToken(terse?: boolean): Result<string>;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

terse


</td><td>

boolean


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ If true, the token will be terse, omitting qualifier names where possible.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

Result&lt;string&gt;

`Success` with the [condition set token](./ts-res.conditionsettoken.md) if successful, `Failure` with an error message otherwise.
